'''''One Ring for the Rite of All''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Chenyu's Splendor]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to upgrade the [[Votive Rainjade]] in [[Carp's Rest]] to its maximum level.

==Trivia==
* The achievement name is a reference to the phrase "One ring to rule them all" from the fantasy novel ''{{w|The Lord of the Rings}}'' written by {{w|J. R. R. Tolkien}}.
